title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect information in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 - The information provided in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is incorrect. It states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: Currently, the bug report does not specify the observed behavior.
EB: The expected result is that the Reload link should be http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR:
1. Open the servlet example in the Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 documentation.
2. Set a custom cookie name using the provided instructions.
3. Verify the URL rewriting behavior.
4. Observe that the resulting URL for the Reload link is not as expected.
